Description:
Detects execution of the AgentExecutor.exe binary. Which can be abused as a LOLBIN to execute powershell scripts with the ExecutionPolicy "Bypass" or any binary named "powershell.exe" located in the path provided by 6th positional argument

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), memory-shards
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: AgentExecutor PowerShell Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '% -powershell%' or command like '% -remediationscript%') and (process_path = '\agentexecutor.exe' and original_file_name = 'agentexecutor.exe')) and  not parent_process_path like '%\microsoft.management.services.intunewindowsagent.exe')
